name: Olimpia
description:
Olimpia is a Speed run Pixel Platformer.

SHORT DESCRIPTION

In this game you have to help the main character to cross the levels without dying.

CHARACTERS

The protagonist of the game ia a boy who wears a party dinosaur cotume and likes to go everywhere with his costume. 

ENEMIES

There will be enemies that will get in Dino's way and he must dodge them, his biggest enemies are frogs, which spit out of their mouths and can kill you.

Dino will have to go through many difficult paths, facing enemies and dodging traps in order to survive and get all the golden apples, yes, apples are his favorite food.

LEVELS

In this game there are two levels, where you will have to put them all trying not to die, the Checkpoints throughout the map will help you a lot, which are quite useful.
